marklogic.body: Typical, the low life black community historically circles around an Opportunity to rape, pillage and Burn. It amazes me that the martyr is Always a HOODLUM and never a law abiding, contributing member of society. Maybe it's because decent Blacks don't find themselves in situations like these Hoodlums. Race Baiter Whores like Sharpton, Farrakhan, Jackson and those illiterate Congressmen and Women use such an event as an opportunity to make news and line their pockets. It's 2012 and it feels like 1965.
